name: RUN ON
description:
Supports both single mode and multi mode.

Do not support an automatic save system.

Single Mode: Clear the map by using checkpoint items to avoid various traps.

Multi Mode: Clear the map with friends by using various items.

The goal of this game is for the player to reach the goal while avoiding obstacles. Throughout the game, various obstacles appear, and the player's agility and strategic judgment play a crucial role. The game becomes easier for a limited amount of time whenever you obtain certain randomly generated items. Items provide various functions such as , jetpack, speed-up, etc., enhancing the excitement of the game.


The game offers SINGLE and MULTI Modes for up to 10 players.
In MULTI mode, you can compete with other players and aim for a higher rank. Additionally, the time taken from the starting point to the goal is displayed, allowing for comparison between personal current records and best records.
These competitive elements enhance the game's challenge and enjoyment.


The game's maps can be played at three different levels: EASY, NORMAL, and HARD. This allows players to enjoy the game at a level that matches their skills and gradually become familiar with higher levels. The quantity and pattern of obstacles change according to the level, increasing the game's replay value and providing a sense of achievement for players.


We give players a chance to have fun and face challenges by combining different game modes, items, and levels of difficulty.
